meanings.definition: A gun that uses compressed air to propel a projectile.
meanings.sent1: My brother got an airgun for his birthday.
meanings.sent2: The hunter aimed his airgun at the target.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel laughed at the tiny airgun pointed at it.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like bullets shot from an airgun, hitting their mark.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the airgun firing echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: I will airgun the cans in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: He likes to airgun targets for practice.
meanings.sent3: She airgunned the balloons at the fair with precision.
meanings.sent4: The team airgunned their way to victory in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The kids airgunned imaginary foes in their backyard adventures.
